vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.2;
son of: Jahath (H3189);
brother of: Lahad (H3855)
§ Ahumai = "a water reed: brother of waters"
grandson of Shobal, descendant of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Jáhat; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞戶買 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "蘆葦: 水的兄弟"
猶大的後裔 (代上 4:2)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚户买 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "芦苇: 水的兄弟"
犹大的后裔 (代上 4:2)
